promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute legendary wolf psychic-type pokemon wearing golden gemstones. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemalune, a a chibi cute legendary wolf psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Calamity Blast, Cursed Drop. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "psychic" or "Gemalune". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, wolf-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This adorably fierce legend dwells in cryptic lairs, wielding its Calamity Blast to fend off foes, while using Cursed Drop to purify tainted spirits.
